channel.title: Command Not Working

item.title: Command Not Working
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Replace it with…

if (command.startsWith("boner") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("chiz")) {
		{
		startAnimation(1770);
		sendMessage("PARTAY!");
	}

Reply, tell me if it works…

good luck

Ps: Add me on msn (if you want) incase it does not work, so i can help you faster…

Read full topic

item.title: Command Not Working
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

It’s really late for me, so I need some help. I’m trying to make a command to make my guy get a boner.

if (command.startsWith("boner") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("chiz")) { { startAnimation(1770); sendMessage("PARTAY!"); }

I always get this error:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Compiler
client.java:472: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
if (command.startsWith(“boner”) && (playerName.e
qualsIgnoreCase(“chiz”) {
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
